name: tin-args
description: Simple command line argument extraction script with no complicated feature
author: jeffy-g <hirotom1107@gmail.com>

scripts.postbuild: yarn del:crap && prettier --ignore-path '' -w build && yarn minify
scripts.minify: cat build/dev.js > build/index.js && jstool -cmd rmc -basePath build -test re/index\.js/ && jstool -cmd minify -basePath build -test re/index\.js/
